title: Phase 3: Process Primitives (dream-process)
description:
Implement Process module (mirrors Elixir):
- spawn, spawn_link, spawn_monitor
- link, unlink (bidirectional)
- monitor, demonitor (unidirectional)
- send, send_after
- exit (signal sending)
- flag (trap_exit)
- alive, self_pid
- register, whereis, unregister

Dependencies: Phase 2 (runtime)

title: Phase 5: Supervisor (dream-supervisor)
description:
Implement Supervisor pattern:
- Strategy: OneForOne, OneForAll, RestForOne
- ChildSpec: id, start, restart, shutdown, type
- RestartType: Permanent, Transient, Temporary
- ShutdownType: BrutalKill, Timeout, Infinity
- Supervisor trait with init callback
- SupervisorFlags: strategy, max_restarts, max_seconds
- Client API: start_link, start_child, terminate_child, etc.
- Restart rate limiting

Dependencies: Phase 4 (GenServer)

title: Phase 1: Core Types (dream-core)
description:
Implement foundational types:
- Pid: Process identifier with node + id
- Ref: Unique reference for monitors/timers  
- ExitReason: Normal, Shutdown, Killed, Error
- Message trait: Serialize/Deserialize with postcard
- SystemMessage: Exit, Down, Timeout variants

This phase establishes the type foundation for all other crates.

title: Phase 2: Runtime & Scheduler (dream-runtime)
description:
Build the async runtime infrastructure:
- ProcessRegistry: DashMap-based concurrent registry
- RefGenerator: Atomic counter for unique Refs
- Scheduler: tokio-based task spawning
- Mailbox: mpsc channels for message delivery
- ProcessHandle: Interface for process lifecycle

Dependencies: Phase 1 (core types)

title: Phase 4: GenServer (dream-gen-server)
description:
Implement GenServer pattern:
- GenServer trait with all callbacks
- init, handle_call, handle_cast, handle_info, handle_continue, terminate
- InitResult, CallResult, CastResult, InfoResult enums
- Client API: start, start_link, call, cast, reply, stop
- Binary protocol for call/cast/reply messages
- Timeout support
- From type for deferred replies

Dependencies: Phase 3 (process primitives)

title: Phase 6: Application (dream-application)
description:
Implement Application lifecycle:
- Application trait with start/stop
- AppConfig (key-value configuration)
- StartResult: Supervisor, Process, None
- AppController for managing running apps
- Dependency resolution and startup order
- Graceful shutdown

Dependencies: Phase 5 (Supervisor)

title: Phase 7: Macros (dream-macros)
description:
Ergonomic macros:
- receive! with pattern matching and timeout
- spawn!, spawn_link!, spawn_monitor!
- GenServer derive macro (optional)
- call!, cast! convenience macros

Dependencies: Phase 4 (GenServer) for full functionality

title: Phase 8: Main Crate (dream)
description:
Umbrella crate re-exporting all functionality:
- Re-export prism-core types
- Re-export process functions  
- Re-export GenServer and Supervisor
- Prelude module for convenient imports
- Integration examples

Dependencies: All other phases
